content: side 1 rs facing rejoin yarn cd to the 19 sts on the circular needle continue short row 1 increase kfb k9 w+tk as follows short row 2 p11 row 1 increase k19 then pick up and knit 6 sts across row ends to puppy s short row 3 k10 w+tk right hind leg marker - 25sts short row 4 p10 row 2 p16 turn so knit side faces short row 5 k9 w+tk note the remaining 9 tail sts can either remain on the needle or be short row 6 p9 slipped onto the circular needle if you find it easier short row 7 k8 w+tk row 3 decrease k4 k2tog k1 - 12 right hind leg sts short row 8 p8 row 4 p12 turn so knit side faces short row 9 k7 w+tk row 5 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 10sts short row 10 p7 row 6 increase cast on 12 sts for right paw p22 - 22 right hind leg sts row 8 decrease k2tog twice knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 20sts row 7 knit pm for right rear end marker on first stitch row 9-10 beginning with a purl row work two row stocking stitch right paw row 11 decrease cast off 11 sts purl-wise for left heel purl to end - 9sts short row to shape the foot pad side 1 left paw front short row 1 increase pfb p9 w+tp row 12 decrease k2tog twice knit to end of row - 7sts short row 2 k11 row 13 purl short row 3 p10 w+tp row 14 decrease *k2tog cast off 1** repeat from * to ** all along fasten short row 4 k10 off last stitch for left paw front edge short row 5 p9 w+tp short row 6 k9 short row 7 p8 w+tp short row 8 k8 new born puppy pattern page 23 new born puppy pattern page 24 short row 9 p7 w+tp work short row to shape tail tip as follows short row 10 k7 short row 1 k8 w+tk short row 2 p7 w+tp row 8 decrease p2tog twice p17 p2tog - 20sts short row 3 k6 w+tk row 9-10 work two row stocking stitch short row 4 p5 w+tp row 11 decrease cast off 11 sts for right heel knit to end - 9sts short row 5 k4 w+tk right paw front short row 6 p3 w+tp row 12 decrease p2tog twice p5 - 6sts short row 7 k2 w+tk row 13 knit short row 8 p1 w+tp row 14 decrease *p2tog cast off 1 purl-wise** repeat from * to ** three short row 9 k5 to end of row times fasten_off last stitch for right paw front edge row 20 decrease p2tog p1 p3tog p1 p2tog - 5sts tail cast off all 5 tail point sts ws facing rejoin yarn cd to the 9 tail sts row 1 increase cast on 4 sts for tail base p13 across - 13
